original_title: Idade Óssea – Um Filme em Sete Quadros
overview: Through a stimulant intercross of techniques -which incorporates not only photography but also traditional animation and stop motion, among others- Isabel Aboim Ingles constructs a collage that is so playful as it is personal, in which she reflects on the pass of time, ages, aches and human nature.
title: Idade Óssea – Um Filme em Sete Quadros
